title: Quarterly Board Meeting
description: Q1 2026 board review. Prepare financial summary and growth metrics.
prep_brief:
Background: Quarterly board meeting with 5 board members.

Last Interaction: Q4 board meeting in November — discussed expansion into Swiss market and hiring plan.

Open Invoices: None related to board.

Talking Points:
- Revenue up 12% in January (€41,300)
- 3 new clients acquired this quarter
- Automation saved ~18 hours/month
- Discuss Q2 hiring: need senior developer
- Swiss market entry update

title: TechVision Partnership Call
description: Discuss annual contract terms with Hans Mueller from TechVision GmbH.
prep_brief:
Background: TechVision GmbH is a Berlin SaaS company (50-100 employees). Active client since Q3 2025. Current deal value: €45,000 for annual contract.

Last Interaction: Email on Feb 13 about Q1 milestone review — very positive about analytics module.

Open Invoices: INV-2026-015 (€12,000) — paid on time.

Talking Points:
- Annual contract terms and pricing
- Q1 deliverables: segmentation, churn model, forecasting
- Upsell opportunity: customer segmentation module
- Timeline expectations for Q2

title: CloudFirst Monthly Sync
description: Monthly sync with Anna Schmidt about ongoing cloud consulting engagement.
prep_brief:
Background: CloudFirst AG — Zurich cloud infrastructure company. 12-month retainer contract signed January. Monthly retainer for cloud consulting.

Last Interaction: Feb 13 email — 28/40 hours used, may need extra for Terraform migration.

Open Invoices: INV-2026-020 (€8,500) — overdue, payment promised by end of this week.

Talking Points:
- February hours usage (28/40)
- Terraform migration scope — additional hours needed?
- New Kubernetes monitoring project (€12-15K)
- Invoice #1042 payment status
- March planning

title: GreenEnergy Discovery Call
description: Discovery call with Lisa Braun and CTO Marco about solar monitoring dashboard.
prep_brief:
Background: GreenEnergy Startup — Hamburg clean energy startup, 10-25 employees. Inbound lead from website, interested in solar monitoring dashboard.

Last Interaction: Email confirming call, CTO Marco will attend. Requested IoT dashboard examples.

Open Invoices: None — new lead.

Talking Points:
- Understand solar installation monitoring needs
- Show SmartHome IoT dashboard as reference
- Discuss sensor data types and frequencies
- Budget conversation — startup pricing available
- Timeline and phased approach

title: SecureNet Kickoff Meeting
description: Project kickoff for security audit dashboard with SecureNet team.
prep_brief:
Background: SecureNet Cyber — Berlin cybersecurity company. €60,000 project for security audit dashboard. NDA signed Feb 13.

Last Interaction: Team introductions email on Feb 14. Klaus (sponsor), Eva (tech lead), Jan (DevOps), Sara (compliance).

Open Invoices: None — project starting.

Talking Points:
- Project scope confirmation: real-time monitoring, SIEM integration, SOC2 reporting
- Team structure from both sides
- Development methodology and sprint planning
- Access requirements and security protocols
- Milestone schedule and payment terms
- First sprint goals
action_items: Set up shared project management board

title: FinanceHub Follow-up Call
description: Follow up on proposal questions with Michael Weber.
prep_brief:
Background: FinanceHub Solutions — Frankfurt FinTech, 25-50 employees. Proposal stage for payment integration project (€28,000).

Last Interaction: Answered 3 questions: 7 weeks (not 6), Stripe migration included, 3-month warranty.

Open Invoices: None — pre-contract.

Talking Points:
- Confirm 7-week timeline is acceptable
- Discuss Stripe migration details
- Address any remaining concerns
- Next steps: contract signing
